text: The New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX) is the world's largest physical commodity futures exchange. It is in New York City. Its two principal divisions are the New York Mercantile Exchange and the New York Commodities Exchange (COMEX) which were once independent companies but are now merged. ==Other websites== * National Futures Association * New York Mercantile Exchange Official Website Category:Companies based in New York City Category:Stock exchanges in the United States Category:1882 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in New York (state)
title: New York Mercantile Exchange
